mapper.select: SELECT x, ROUND(AVG(y), 2) as y FROM( SELECT distinct DATE_FORMAT(CONVERT_TZ( DATE_FORMAT(RCVTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:00'),'+0:00', '+09:00') ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:00') AS x, AirTemperature AS y from ( SELECT RCVTime, AirTemperature FROM pier_env WHERE date_format(RCVTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') >= str_to_date(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND date_format(RCVTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') < str_to_date(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND UPPER(SensorId) = #{sensorId} )a )TEMP GROUP BY x order by x asc
